title: ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ Season 11, Episode 4 Recap
description:
After a week off, Bill Simmons is joined by Joe House to discuss Season 11, Episode 4 of 'Curb Your Enthusiasm.' They talk about golfing with rabbis, love for watermelon, their cast and non-cast MVPs, and their grade for the episode.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Joe House
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
